attributes.action: Ban MP's employing any family member in connection with his/her duties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No MP should consider or be permitted to employ a member of his/her family in connection with his/her ministerial duties. This blatent abuse of public funds is unacceptable and not in the tax payers interest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
